unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Absolutely crucial, especially with unpredictable monsoons these days. Heard from Ramlal in my village, Jaipur, that his insurance saved him after the floods on 26/07/2023. Imagine losing your entire Bajra crop! The PMFBY scheme is good, but payouts can be slow. Anyone had experiences with SBI General Insurance after, say, 10/10/2022? Filed my claim on 15/09/2023 at 14:00 hrs, still waiting! Hope it's better than last year's Rs. 5000 payout... Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Absolutely crucial, especially with unpredictable monsoons these days. Heard from Ramlal in my village, Jaipur, that his insurance saved him after the floods on twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty three. Imagine losing your entire Bajra crop! The P M F B Y scheme is good, but payouts can be slow. Anyone had experiences with S B I General Insurance after, say, tenth october two thousand and twenty two? Filed my claim on fifteenth september two thousand and twenty three at two P M, still waiting! Hope it's better than last year's rupee five thousand payout... Jai Kisan!
